Package ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team18

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Accolades
    Accolades class used for determining which accolades have been met, and which accolades have not been met.
    Activity
    The Activity class creates Activity objects that will store the name and value of a certain activity
    APIData
    The purpose of this class is to create objects that will access the Fitbit's API servers via Oauthentication 2 and will parse through the resulting JSON texts and store the various values for each of the object's attributes
    BaseDashBoard
    Handles the backend for the BaseDashBoard
    BaseDashBoardUI
    BaseDashBoardUI class.
    BestActivity
    Extends the Activity Class to include date that stat was achieved
    DailyGoals
    Class that saves, loads, and checks date and measure variables in the daily goals component
    DailyGoalsUI
    Class that displays the contents of daily goals component including creating a goal, switching the date, and removing a goal
    Data
    Abstract parent class for the APIData and TestData classes that will store all the attributes
    FitbitApp
    FitBitApp class, this is the main method to run the program
    FitCalc
    Handles all the FitCalc backend for both UIs
    FitCalcActivity
    Extends the Activity Class to include data for fit calc activities, which stores the mets as well
    FitCalcDisplayActivities
    Class that handles all the text that the FitCalcUI2 displays
    FitCalcUI
    Creates the first window of the FitCalcUI
    FitCalcUI2
    Creates the UI for the second window of FitCalc
    Goal
    Class that holds data to be stored in goalList class and displayed onto the UI
    GoalList
    Class that stores the list of user's created daily goals
    HeartRateUI
    Creates the HeartRateUI
    HeartRateZone
    Extends the activity class for HeartRateZone objects by adding descriptions, minutes, and minimum and maximum values
    SingleBox
    Class that creates various tiles that are on the basedashboard
    TestData
    The purpose of this class is to create objects that will access the the text file Data.txt and store the various values for each of the object's attributes
